listitem.para: The easiest way to download Midgard is to use already built binary packages. For Vinland (Midgard2 9.03) you may find some at OBS repository.
You can download release tarballs from Midgard website.

Also, you can get Midgard from SVN repository.
$ mkdir -p svn/midgard/branches $ cd svn/midgard/branches $ svn co https://svn.midgard-project.org/midgard/branches/vinland
